settings.page_info:
Excision is a manufacturer
of high quality metal
working fluids for
all applications. We
manufacture soluble oils to
neat cutting oils and also
supply other metalworking
fluids such as slideway oil
and hydraulic oils.
With unique geometry, these core drills simplify drilling operations for any diameter or depth. Experience effortless drilling and save time and energy with our exceptional performance.

These high-quality holesaws are made with M42 material, containing 8% cobalt for improved performance and increased cutting life.

The Excision Holesaws are capable of quick, precise, and effortless cutting of various materials including steel, stainless steel, copper, wood (including nails), plywood, veneers, melamines, plastics, pipes, tubing, and more. Additionally, these holesaws are re-sharpenable, ensuring longevity and providing a great return on investment.

Excision stocks an extensive range of metal preparing machines from plate bevelers to punching units. Whether you have small pieces or large plates we have your weld and
paint prep sorted.

settings.section_title_1: How to buy a Bandsaw Blade
settings.section_info_1:
A Bandsaw Blade has 3 important dimensions

  • Width
  • Length
  • Tooth Pitch (Usually measured in Teeth Per Inch known as TPI.)
settings.small_title_2: how wide is your blade requirement?
settings.section_info_2: Blade width is measured from the tip of the blade to the back of the blade. Metal cutting bandsaws are normally specified on the machine by the manufacturer. Wood cutting bandsaws or vertical bandsaws can have multiple widths. If your saw has this option refer to page 35 for different options.
settings.section_info_3:
Adjust the wheels of the machine to their correct position (about the middle of the adjustment range)

  • Refering to the diagram below, measure the distance between the centre point of each wheel in mm (measurement D).
  • l Now measure the radius of each wheel in mm (R1 and R2).
  • l Use this formula to calculate the band length
settings.section_info_4:
The tooth pitch describes the number of teeth per inch(TPI). You must select the correct tpi for the thickness of material you are cutting. If the correct tpi is not chosen the blade life will be dramatically shortened. Refer to page 32-35 for more detail.
For combi or variable toothing the first figure represents the largest distance between tooth tips and the second figure the smallest distance between tooth tips within one group
settings.small_title_4:
Constant tooth pitch

This tooth pitch has a constant distance from tooth to tooth. It is very suitable for cross sections and non-ferrous materials.

Combi / Variable tooth pitch

The combi tooth pitch has different tooth tip distances within one toothing group. The application area of the band saw blade is increased and vibrations are reduced

settings.section_top_title: When you need something really tough!
settings.section_top_info: Griplox Pliers are the professional range of heavy duty pliers made for the professional tradesmen. Superior grip, extended jaw options and unbeatable, finely regulated clamping force makes this the must have tool set.

settings.heading: Why Excision?
settings.info:
Excision prides itself on manufacturing durable tools that perform but last the test of time in Australia's toughest conditions.

The Excision Xtreme GripLox:

  • Professional Strength
  • Superior ergonomics ensures smooth, quick-release action
  • Extra wide jaw action when needed
